name: Anticipation
primaryTexts: Ready up to 2 planets you control.
Ready a technology, an agent, or a relic you control.
Redistribute any any number of the command tokens on your sheet.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to ready up to 2 planets you control.

name: Diplomacy
primaryTexts: Choose a system, other than Mecatol Rex, that contains a planet you control; each other player places a token from their reinforcements in that system.
Look at the top card of each exploration deck.
Explore 2 planets you contorl.
Draw 1 action card.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to explore 1 planet you control and draw 1 action card.

name: Leadership
primaryTexts: Gain 3 command tokens
Spend any amount of influence to gain 1 command token for every 3 influence spent
secondaryTexts: Spend any amount of influence to gain 1 command token for every 3 influence spent

name: Politics
primaryTexts: Choose a player other than the speaker.  That player gains the speaker token.
Draw 2 action cards
Look at the top 2 cards of the agenda deck. Place each card on the top or bottom of the deck in any order.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 2 action cards.

name: Construction
primaryTexts: Place up to 2 structures on planets you control.
secondaryTexts: Place 1 token from your strategy pool in any system; you may place either 1 space dock or 1 PDS on a planet you control in that system.

name: Trade
primaryTexts: Gain 3 trade goods.
Replenish commodities.
Choose any number of other players. Those players use the secondary ability of this strategy card without spending a command token.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to replenish your commodities.

name: Warfare
primaryTexts: Choose 1 system. You may use the PRODUCTION ability of one of your units in that system. If you do, place a command token from your reinforcements into that system.
Remove one of your commmand tokens from the game board. Then, gain 1 command token.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 of your command tokens from your strategy pool to use the PRODUCTION ability of 1 of your space docks in your home system.

name: Technology
primaryTexts: Research 1 technology.
Spend 6 resources to research 1 technology.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool and 4 resources to research 1 technology.

name: Espionage
primaryTexts: Score 1 public objective if you fullfill the requirements.
You may perform the secondary ability of any exhuasted strategy card, spending tokens from your reinforcements.
secondaryTexts: Resolve this ability as if it were instead the ability of any one exhausted strategy card.

name: Imperial
primaryTexts: Gain 1 victory point if you control Mecatol Rex. Otherwise, draw 1 secret objective.
Draw 1 secret objective.
secondaryTexts: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to draw 1 secret objective.
